title: Population Health Management Education: Strengthening Program Evaluation Competencies Through Stage-Based Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational public health concepts, understanding of pharmaceutical/healthcare systems, and data interpretation skills
context.additional_context: Practical skill-focused training for medical professionals, emphasizing program evaluation competency development through real-case-based scenarios.

learning_goals: Derive priority programs through health needs assessment of specific patient populations.
Establish an evaluation design to measure the effectiveness of health management programs according to the CDC Program Evaluation Framework.
Analyze program outcome data to suggest practical improvement directions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
